AI.name: Super Mario Bros.™
AI.description: Original Release Date: October 1985 Rediscover Mario & Luigi's first great adventure! One day, the Mushroom Kingdom was invaded by the Koopas, a tribe of turtles famous for their black magic. The quiet, peace-loving Mushroom People were turned into stones, bricks, and even plants, and the kingdom fell into ruin. The only one who can undo the magic spell is Princess Toadstool, the daughter of the Mushroom King. Unfortunately, she is in the hands of evil king Bowser™. Mario™ learns of the Mushroom People's plight and sets out to free the Mushroom Princess from the Koopas and restore the fallen kingdom. Jump, kick shells, and throw fireballs through eight action-packed worlds in this iconic NES classic!

BR.name: Super Mario Bros.™
BR.description: Data do lançamento original: outubro 1985 Redescubra a primeira grande aventura de Mario & Luigi! Um dia, o reino Mushroom foi invadido pelos Koopas, uma tribo de tartarugas famosas por sua magia negra. O povo sossegado e pacífico de Mushroom foi transformado em pedras, tijolos e até plantas, e o reino ficou em ruínas. A única que pode desfazer o encanto mágico é a princesa Toadstool, filha do rei de Mushroom. Infelizmente, ela está nas mãos do malvado rei Bowser™. Mario™ fica sabendo da situação do povo de Mushroom e parte em uma jornada para libertar a princesa de Mushroom dos Koopas e restaurar o reino arruinado. Salte, chute cascos, e lance bolas de fogo por oito mundos repletos de ação nesse clássico icônico do NES!

MX.name: Super Mario Bros.™
MX.description: Fecha de lanzamiento original: octubre 1985 ¡Redescubre la primera gran aventura de Mario y Luigi! Un día, el Reino Champiñón fue invadido por una tribu de tortugas conocidas por su magia negra, los Koopas. Los apacibles habitantes del reino fueron convertidos en rocas, ladrillos e incluso plantas y el reino cayó en ruinas. La única capaz de deshacer el hechizo es la princesa Toadstool, hija del rey Champiñón. Desafortunadamente el malvado rey Bowser™ la tiene prisionera. Cuando Mario™ se entera de la terrible situación de los habitantes del reino, se embarca en una aventura que buscará liberar a la princesa del Reino Champiñón del cautiverio de los Koopas y así restaurar al caído reino. ¡Salta, patea caparazones y arroja bolas de fuego a través de ocho mundos repletos de acción en este clásico de NES!

Jump, kick shells, and throw fireballs through eight action-packed worlds in this iconic NES classic!

PY.name: Super Mario Bros.™
PY.description: Original Release Date: October 1985 Rediscover Mario & Luigi's first great adventure! One day, the Mushroom Kingdom was invaded by the Koopas, a tribe of turtles famous for their black magic. The quiet, peace-loving Mushroom People were turned into stones, bricks, and even plants, and the kingdom fell into ruin. The only one who can undo the magic spell is Princess Toadstool, the daughter of the Mushroom King. Unfortunately, she is in the hands of evil king Bowser™. Mario™ learns of the Mushroom People's plight and sets out to free the Mushroom Princess from the Koopas and restore the fallen kingdom.
